GSD.description:
ext4: fix warning in ext4_handle_inode_extension

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 0ab308d72af7548f21e4499d025c25887da0c26a. For more details please see the references link.
